testing_tools: OWASP ZAP; Burp Suite; Custom Scripts
test_scenarios: ["User Enumeration (Registration, PW Reset)","Credential Stuffing","Brute Force (Login, MFA)","Session Hijacking (Token Reuse)","MFA Bypass","Insecure Direct Object Reference (IDOR) on audit/user endpoints"]
acceptance_criteria: Zero critical or high vulnerabilities. All findings must have a remediation plan.
remediation_sla: Critical: 24 hours; High: 7 days; Medium: 30 days
reporting_requirements: Detailed report with reproducible steps and risk ratings.
trend_analysis: Track number of findings per quarter.

test_scenarios: ["Detection of hardcoded secrets","Known vulnerabilities in third-party dependencies","Common coding anti-patterns (e.g., SQL injection vectors)"]
acceptance_criteria: Pipeline fails if any new Critical or High severity vulnerability is introduced.
remediation_sla: Must be fixed before PR can be merged.
reporting_requirements: Automated reporting within the GitHub pull request.
trend_analysis: Track number of vulnerabilities caught per month.
